title: Mark Simonson... Brilliant!
content:
I had been working on a logo for a personal project for about 2 months, but just couldn't get out of my own way. I started cruising the net looking for inspiration and ran into [www.ms-studio.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020071134/http:/www.ms-studio.com/ "www.ms-studio.com"). Mark's work blew me away and I begged him to help me on my gig... The end result just blew me away...

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [jockeyjournal.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020071134/http:/typophile.com/files/jockeyjournal.gif) | 4.45 KB |
author: RyanC

comments.content: I agree..very unique and screams for attention!
Ooooh! that _is_ gorgeous. Nice work, Mark!
